about_the_game:
Story

10 years have passed since the day your family disappeared. After several nights of insomnia, you decide to see a doctor for a solution. When you get home, you take sleeping pills to sleep better. However, they cause sleepwalking episodes that revive your childhood traumas, making sleep no longer a safe place…

Key Features

- BETWEEN DREAMS AND NIGHTMARES

  • Step into the shoes of someone suffering from sleepwalking episodes.

  • Immerse yourself in a psychological horror experience where reality and dreams intertwine.

  • Experience the unsettling No REM state, a point where the real world merges with the dream world, housing the protagonist's most macabre nightmares.

- NOTHING IS AS IT SEEMS

  • In the world of dreams, the rules change completely! You won't be able to read, images will appear distorted, you have no control over your environment, and running is not an option…

  • Survive entities that will try to approach you the moment you get distracted.

- BRIDGE BETWEEN TWO WORLDS

  • Connect with your sleepwalking body in the real world to interact with its objects.

- SCARS FROM THE PAST

  • Delve deep into the unconscious to solve puzzles, combining the real world with the dream world to uncover the past that haunts you.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not suitable for all ages. Part of the story focuses on the consequences of taking sleeping pills. Player discretion is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 or AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Parasomnia: No-REM is a psychological horror game that places the player between two states: awake and sleepwalking, each with its distinctive mechanics and gameplay. Solve puzzles, reveal dark secrets from your unconscious and survive in this great original horror story.
